casebody.data:
Robert STROUD, Appellant, v. James A. JOHNSTON, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Alcatraz Island, California, Appellee. No. 11640. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Sept. 4, 1947. Robert Stroud, in pro. per., for appellant. Frank J. Hennessy, U. S. Atty., and Joseph Karesh, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of San Francisco, Cal., for appellee.

Before GARRECHT, MATHEWS, and HEALY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court affirmed.
